medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
description: white body with subtle woven designs; ruffled neckline and sleeve fabric in light grey, edged in scalloped crochet and embroidered in purple, green, yellow and pinks with floral designs
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
